articles.description: Coach to Novak Djokovic, Goran Ivanisevic has suggested Daniil Medvedev gifted the Serb a crucial break that gave him the set.
articles.content: After Novak Djokovic beat Daniil Medvedev to the title at US Open, Goran Ivanisevic gave his unfiltered opinion on the clash. He said Medvedev gave Djokovic the first set, allowing him to run away wi… [+3418 chars]

articles.title: Watch: New Zealand players’ family members announces World Cup squad in heartwarming video - Wisden
articles.description: Watch: New Zealand Cricket named their squad for the 2023 ICC World Cup with a heartwarming video featuring the families of the cricketers.
articles.content:
